t: Japan competition authorities raid Amazon Japan, source says | Reuters
s: November 26, 2024 - Japan's Fair Trade Commission on Tuesday conducted an on-site inspection of Amazon Japan on suspicion of violating anti-monopoly laws, a government source said.
